algorithm_technique: hash map to count losses, set to track all players, then filter
problem_summary_simple: Find players with no losses and players with exactly one loss from match results.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hash map to count losses per player and a set to store all unique players, then filters based on loss counts.
key_insights: A hash map (defaultdict) is efficient for counting occurrences (losses).
A set is useful for storing unique players encountered.
Sorting the final lists is required by the problem statement.
